invalidusergroupname-title: Custom error title given when user enters invalid input into Special:UserGroups/new.
invalidusergroupname-error: Custom error message given when user enters invalid input into Special:UserGroups/new.
nosuchusergroup: Displays if the user enters an invalid user group name for Special:UserGroups.
usergroupnameexists-error: Error message thrown when user inputs a name for a new user group when the name has already been taken.
usergroups-createnew: Dropdown option in Special:UserGroups to create a new user group.
usergroups-editgroup-delete: Toggle to delete this usergroup using Special:UserGroups.
usergroups-editgroup-desc: Description header for the main form page of Special:UserGroups.
usergroups-editgroup-newgroup: Input textfield for the new usergroup's name
usergroups-editgroup-reason: Optional reason given for modifying these user groups.
usergroups-editgroup-revoke: Toggle to determine if this usergroup should be part of $wgGroupPermissions or $wgRevokePermissions
usergroups-editgroup-save: Button to submit changes when user is finished accessing Special:UserGroups.
usergroups-editgroup-userrights: The set of all available user rights.
usergroups-log-none:
Placeholder when parameters $4 or $5 contain no user rights in [[MediaWiki:Logentry-usergroups-modify]].
{{Related|Logentry-usergroups}}
usergroups-log-revoke:
Fills parameter $7 for [[MediaWiki:Logentry-usergroups-create]]; specifies if the newly created user group is a revoke-type, as defined by $wgRevokePermissions.
{{Related|Usergroups-log-revoke}}
usergroups-log-revoke-switchon:
Fills parameter $7 for [[MediaWiki:Logentry-usergroups-modify]]; specifies if the modified user group was switched to revoke type, as defined by $wgRevokePermissions.
{{Related|Usergroups-log-revoke}}
usergroups-log-revoke-switchoff:
Fills parameter $7 for [[MediaWiki:Logentry-usergroups-modify]]; specifies if the modified user group was switched to normal type.
{{Related|Usergroups-log-revoke}}
logentry-usergroups-modify:
Parameters:
* $1 - user
* $4 - user group name
* $5 - user rights added to the group
* $6 - user rights removed from the group
* $7 - {{Related|Usergroups-log-revoke}}
{{Related|Logentry-usergroups}}
